application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Plum (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 4.50m:  Formative prune:  Tip prune to reduce height by approximately 0.50m. General maintenance.2 x Laurel (applicants ref. T4, T5) - Approximately 4.50m: Tip prune to reduce by approximately 1.20m. General maintenance.1 x Acer (applicants ref. T6) - Approximately 8.00m-9.00m:  Thin crown density by 10%.  Remove major dead wood throughout crown.  Reduce any long branches back into main crown structure up to 1.20m.  General maintenance.1 x Gingko (applicants ref. T7) - Approximately 2.50m:  Remove. To be replaced with a more appropriate specimen.1 x Beech (applicants ref. T8) - Approximately 4.00m: Fell to ground level. Tree is planted too close to a mature Cornus and Cherry. Control overcrowding.1 x Cornus or Acer (applicants ref. T9) - Approximately 6.00m: Reduce over extended branches back into main crown structure,  approximately 1.20m.  General maintenance.1 x Cherry (applicants ref. T10) - Approximately 5.00m: Remove dead wood only.  General maintenance.1 x Amelanchier (applicants ref. T11) - Approximately 3.00m:  Tip prune by approximately 30cm.  General maintenance.1 x Amelanchier (applicants ref. T12) - Approximately 3.00m:  Tip prune by approximately 30cm.  General maintenance.1 x Hazel (applicants ref. T13) - Approximately 5.00m: Crown lift by approximately 50cm. Thin crown desnity by 20%. Remove dead wood. General maintenance.
